citethispage-desc: Doda posebno stran za [[Special:CiteThisPage|navedbo vira]] in povezavo v orodno vrstico
tooltip-citethispage: Informacije o tem, kako navajati to stran

__NOTOC__
== Bibliografski podatki za {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Naslov strani: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Avtor: sodelavci {{GRAMMAR:rodilnik|{{SITENAME}}}} * Založnik: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Datum zadnje redakcije: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Datum pridobitve: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Trajni URL: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * ID različice strani: {{REVISIONID}}
== Slog navajanja za {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[Slog APA]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Pridobljeno {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} s {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Priročnik sloga MLA|Slog MLA]] === »{{FULLPAGENAME}}.« ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[Slogovni vodnik MHRA|Slog MHRA]] === Sodelavci {{GRAMMAR:rodilnik|{{SITENAME}}}}, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [pridobljeno {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[Slogovni priročnik Chicago|Slog Chicago]] === Sodelavci {{GRAMMAR:rodilnik|{{SITENAME}}}}, »{{FULLPAGENAME}},« ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (pridobljeno {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Svet urednikov v znanosti|Slog CBE/CSE]] === Sodelavci {{GRAMMAR:rodilnik|{{SITENAME}}}}. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [navedeno {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Dostopno na: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|Slog Bluebook]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (zadnjič obiskano {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Vnos [[BibTeX]] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Na spletu; pridobljeno {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Pri uporabi paketa [[LaTeX]] url (\usepackage{url} nekje v uvodu), kar da precej lepše oblikovane spletne naslove, vam bo morda bolj ustrezalo naslednje: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Na spletu; pridobljeno {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
